reviewText:
First off, a warning to the haters:  it's MC REN -- no, he didn't fall off -- no, the name of the DVD is NOT  "LAST in the Game."  MC REN is still in the game as much as he wanna be.

Second, you shouldn't be watching this looking for "acting"...this is real cats being real.

Third, it's MC REN.  He wrote it, put it together, of course it's tight.

5 STARS.
